SectionBody.Text: It is a misdemeanor of the first degree, punishable as provided in s. 775.082 or s. 775.083, to:

Subsection.Text: Practice or attempt to practice electrology or hold oneself out to be an electrologist without holding an active license.
Practice or attempt to practice electrology under a name other than one’s own.
Use or attempt to use a revoked or suspended license or the license of another.
Obtain or attempt to obtain a license by bribery, fraud, or knowing misrepresentation.
Employ an unlicensed person to practice electrology.
Practice or attempt to practice any permanent hair removal except as described in s. 478.42(5).
